title: Bots in Aram!?
body: Be on the lookout, Ive noticed lately that there are a LOT of bots in ARAM games. They almost always have a summoner name that is something along the lines of [randomword][randomword][randomtwodigitnumber] like this "TeaScooper55". They will also always choose {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:7}}  and have this bear summoner icon. Can anyone else respond that may be experiencing this issue or if there is a way to disable these bots? The trundle bot is an absolute idiot and well, it makes ARAM no fun at all, and that is the casual game mode for me :(

replies.body: I just posted something similar and would love to see someone from riot take the time to address this issue.

Where have you been?! For like.. The past year or so, there are ALWAYS bots in ARAM. People that don't want to level up their accounts on their own etc etc. I've even had a game so bad, that out of all 10 players, at least 6 or 7 of them were bots. {{summoner:3}} {{item:3070}}
